feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [ERI1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack E101
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 17, 07:00 - 14:00 UTC

Feb 7, 04:38 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare metal offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 17/03/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 17/03/2025 14:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in rack E101 will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will move servers from rack E101 to racks E103 and E105.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [IEB01][Bare Metal Cloud] - Rack IEB0101A01A
entry.content:
Feb 13, 00:20 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on rack IEB0101A01A has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 12/02/2025 18:28 UTC
End time : 12/02/2025 23:59 UTC
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a network equipment issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Feb 12, 19:08 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Bare Metal Cloud offer on the specific rack.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 12/02/2025 18:28 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Public and vRack networks are temporarily unavailable for servers in rack IEB0101A01A.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their servers through public and vRack networks.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a network equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilized to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Feb 12, 18:59 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Bare Metal Cloud offer.
Start time : 12/02/2025 18:28 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
